name: It was raining khinkali
description:
Suddenly a khinkali rain have started over Tbilisi, you control towers lights, click and destroy excessive khinkali.
You need to control amount of khinkali that falls, and try to keep the people hapiness meter in green. 
Controls:
Mouse.

Credits:

Used technologies:

unity 2021

extra libraries: TextMeshPro

code: Aleksander Sementsov

images: Aleksander Sementsov

music: Rearngments of  Georgian folklore song "The Drizzle" ("ჟუჟუნა წვიმა მოვიდა") by Aleksander Sementsov

sound effects: 44.1 General Library (Free Sample Pack)
